s.text: www.nps.gov/glac/mammals.htm, where you scroll down a bit to hit Order Rodentia--Rodents (including the hoary marmot!)
The important part is to hit No-Frames at Northwest Voyageurs, which saves you a step.
This was a very hard one, I went down endless dead ends before hitting the right link, although I suppose "Northwest" should have given me a clue.
